name: Posada Del Tepozteco

reviews.title: Good location, not worth staying the night
Service swamped by a family wedding

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Great views, great food, great pool

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Amazing view

description: Hotel Posada del Tepozteco is a fine old manor house of Mexican ancestry, converted into a beautiful boutique hotel. Its flowerly terraces and splendorous gardens allow a spectacular view of the enigmatic, carved mountains, the pyramid of Ometochtli, the 16th Century monastery, the picturesque village and the enchanting horizon of the Magic Valley of Tepoztlan.
